title: Cooperative oxidation of NH3 and H2O to selectively produce nitrate via a nearly barrierless N–O coupling pathway
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01483A, Paper
Kun Dang, Lei Wu, Siqin Liu, Hongwei Ji, Chuncheng Chen, Yuchao Zhang, Jincai Zhao
This work presents a photoanode with state-of-the-art selective ammonia oxidation performance and elucidates its barrierless N–O coupling mechanism.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
